sentences.en: Advances in meteorological instrumentation for air quality and emergency response.
sentences.cn: 大气质量和应急反应的先进气象仪器.

sentences.en: Drought, floods, hail, wind, frost, and other meteorological disasters.
sentences.cn: 旱灾 、 洪涝 、 雹灾 、 风灾 、 霜冻等气象灾害频繁.

sentences.en: Meteorological errors are clearly unlikely to be systematic to any great extent.
sentences.cn: 气象误差显然不大可能在大范围内是系统性的.

sentences.en: Provides medium - range weather forecast support to European meteorological organizations.
sentences.cn: 欧洲主要城市实时天气预报!

sentences.en: Qatar's meteorological office said 51.2 millimetres had fallen so far this month.
sentences.cn: 按照卡塔尔气象部门的说法,本月迄今为止的总降雨量为51.2毫米.

sentences.en: Ridge regression technique is adopted to build up the medical - meteorological forecast model.
sentences.cn: 依此,采用岭回归技术,建立了医疗气象预报模式.

sentences.en: Since 1935, gliders have gained in reputation as tools for aeronautical and meteorological research.
sentences.cn: 1935年以来, 滑翔机作为航空和气象研究的工具获得好评.

sentences.en: The effect of city on meteorological elements ( for example, temperature ) are investigated.
sentences.cn: 文章探讨了城市对气温等气象要素的影响规律.

sentences.en: The local meteorological bureau forecast fresh snow in northern Xinjiang.
sentences.cn: 当地气象局预报在北疆将会出现新雪.

sentences.en: The meteorological model for regression days and hours in Xuzhou was established.
sentences.cn: 建立徐州地区的逐日和逐时气象数学模型.

sentences.en: The meteorological observation station stands apart from the town.
The meteorological observatory in Beijing said the storm could hit the city.
sentences.cn: 气象观测站,在北京说,风暴可能袭击的城市.

sentences.en: The meteorological office has issued a warning of force 12 winds.
sentences.cn: 气象台发布了12级飓风警报.

sentences.en: The mobile communication network can be used into measurements for meteorological monitoring.
sentences.cn: 用手机网络信号可以来监测天气状况.

sentences.en: The World Meteorological Organization also noted extreme weather in other areas.
sentences.cn: 世界气象组织也指出其他区域也有极端的天气现象.

words.tran_cn: 流星；[气象] 大气现象
